application.name: Scratch
application.summary: Programming language learning environment for stories, games, music and art

description.p: Scratch is a programming language that makes it easy to create your own interactive stories, animations, games, music, and art -- and share your creations on the web.
As young people create and share Scratch projects, they learn important mathematical and computational ideas, while also learning to think creatively, reason systematically, and work collaboratively.
This package brings in all of the various subpackages which comprise the full Scratch distribution.
